task.name: agent.tasks.DeployOnPositions
task.description: For the agent, to self deploy on given positions to get ready to apply indirect fires. The agent chooses a position, deploys onto it and wait the order to delevier indirect fires. If the "moveAutomatically" parameter is set to 'TRUE', (default value), the agent decides to change its position after each fire.

parameter.name: deploymentPositions
parameter.description: The set of deploying positions (object knowledges, position, area, urban knowledge).

parameter.name: moveAutomatically
parameter.description: Define if the agent changes automatically its position afer each fire.
